Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 老兵士
Entry.EnglishText: Seasoned Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 若い兵士
Entry.EnglishText: New Recruit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨッツア
Entry.EnglishText: Yotza

Entry.JapaneseText: ナッツ
Entry.EnglishText: Natz

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨッツアの声
Entry.EnglishText: Yotza's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: 母親
Entry.EnglishText: Mother

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: 駅員
Entry.EnglishText: Station Attendant

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 観光客
Entry.EnglishText: Tourist

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 集合住宅
Entry.EnglishText: Apartment Building

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: すげー街だ…… ペトナジャンカとは大違いだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Talk about impressive! This place is on a whole 'nother level from Petnadjanka.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は、初めてなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this your first time here?

Entry.JapaneseText: おうっ、田舎モンなんでな。 <Veigue>、おまえは？
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah! I'm just a small-town guy. What about you, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレも初めてだ。 ……街もすごいが、霧もすごいな。
Entry.EnglishText: It's the first time for me as well. The fog here is as impressive as the town itself.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに、ここは年中、霧がかかっている。 警備する方は大変だろうが、 これを上手く利用できれば、 俺たちも行動しやすい。
Entry.EnglishText: This city is foggy all year long. It's a nuisance for the patrol guards, so we might be able to use it to our advantage.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>やボクは この街に慣れてるからね。 案内は任せといてヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene> and I know this place like the back of our hand, so just follow our lead!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, thanks.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をそんなに おびえているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you look so worried for?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は、いつもこんなに 薄暗いのですか？ どこかに敵が潜んでいても わからないじゃないですか……
Entry.EnglishText: Is this city always so dim? Enemies could be hiding anywhere and we wouldn't even know it...

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカは初めてだったな。 何も起こりゃせんよ、そう固くなるな。 バルカにはうまい酒もあるぞ。 仕事の後にゆっくり酌み交わそうや。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right, you've never been in Balka before. Nothing's gonna happen, so just loosen up. There's a ton of great booze here, you know. Let's grab drinks after our shift!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい!!
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yes, sir!!

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつらとは 戦いたくねーな。
Entry.EnglishText: Man, I don't wanna fight those guys.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうならない事を 祈るしかない。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's just pray that we won't have to.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれが、カレギア城か……
Entry.EnglishText: Is that Callegea Castle?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ…… あまりいい思い出のない ところだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: It is, though I don't have many fond memories of that place.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少し近くまで 行ってもいいか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Can we get a closer look at it?

Entry.JapaneseText: かまわないが……まさか、 直接乗り込むつもりでは なかろうな？
Entry.EnglishText: We can, but you aren't planning on just barging into the castle, are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……できればそうしたい。 しかし……
Entry.EnglishText: I would if I could. But...

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな雰囲気か、 様子だけでも見ておかない？ ボクたちがいた頃とは少し様子も 変わってるだろうし。
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't we at least go and see what the place is like now? It's probably different than when we were last there.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだな。 だが何度も言うようだが、 警備が厳しくなっている。 それを忘れるな。
Entry.EnglishText: Sounds like a plan. And I know I've said this many times already, but the security here is on full alert. Don't forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかっている……
Entry.EnglishText: I know...

Entry.JapaneseText: これは……!? もしかして、 <Veigue>たちが思念の浄化を……!!
Entry.EnglishText: What just happened? Could it be that <Veigue> and the others have purified the <Blue>Will<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く、早くしてよっ！ バイラスが来るわっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry up! Hurry up!! The Biruses will be here any second!

Entry.JapaneseText: どけ、俺たちが先だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Get out of the way! We're going first!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をいうの!! 私たちガジュマが先よ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Excuse me?! Us Gajuma are the ones going first!

Entry.JapaneseText: えーんえーん……
Entry.EnglishText: Waaaah, waaaah...

Entry.JapaneseText: うえーん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Waaahh!!
Um... Are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うん…… ありがとう、おねえちゃん……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yeah... Thanks miss...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ありがとうございます！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, thank you very much!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハ、ハーフ!? ウチの子をどうするつもり!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...W-Wait, a Half?! Just what do you think you're doing with my child?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……
Entry.EnglishText: I was just...

Entry.JapaneseText: おいあんたら！ なんだい、その目は！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you there! Why are you glaring at her like that!?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなが自分が助かる事ばっかり 考えてる時に、この人は、 他人の子を助けようとしたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In a time like this, where everyone is only looking out for themselves, this woman had the sense to look out for someone else's child!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな時に、ハーフも ガジュマもないだろうよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Are there really such things as Halfs or Gajuma at a time like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうです！ バイラスは種族など関係なく、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>を襲います！
Entry.EnglishText: He's right! Biruses don't care about things such as race. They'll attack anyone so long as they're <Yellow>Human<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、私たちは力を合わせて、 バイラスと戦うべきなんじゃ ありませんか!?
Entry.EnglishText: So shouldn't we be working together to fight them off?!

Entry.JapaneseText: バ、バイラスだぁッ!! 助けてくれーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I-It's a Birus! Heeelp!!

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、今までの戦いで、 武器や防具が ずいぶん傷んできてないか？
ああ……確かに……これから ユリスに立ち向かうというのに このままではな……
なんか、こうドカンバカンって ユリスも倒せちゃうスゴイ武器が あったら、いいのにネ。
無茶を言うな…… <Mao>。
あるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: There is.

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋や道具屋で 新しい商品を入荷したって話だぜ。 一度見に行ったらどうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: In the equipment and items shops there are new articles. Why don't you go take a look?

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当か？
旦那ぁ……<Blue>カレギアの辞書<White>の おいらを疑うのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Sir... Do you doubt me?
Entry.Notes: I don't know how to translate the coloured part properly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 見に行って、 損はないんじゃない？
そうだな……急がば回れ、だ。 行ってみよう。
お母さん、しっかりして！ お母さん……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hang in there mom! Mom!

Entry.JapaneseText: うぅ……
Entry.EnglishText: Uugh...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あの…… 大丈夫ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Um, excuse me... Is everything all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……触らないで……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't touch me...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 放っといて……！
Entry.EnglishText: Leave me alone!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんて…… ヒューマなんかに…… 世話になりたく、ない……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want...any help... from some Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そんな事を言っている 場合では……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-This is not the time to say such a thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: 来ないで……！ うぅ……
Entry.EnglishText: Get away from me! Uuh...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしよう、お薬…… お薬がないと……お母さん……
Entry.EnglishText: What do I do? My mom needs medicine... Without it, she'll...!
Medicine...

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>バルカ鉄道は、無料で ご利用いただけます。 ご乗車になりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>The Balka Railway is free of charge. Would you like to take a ride?

Entry.JapaneseText: 南門広場
Entry.EnglishText: South Gate

Entry.JapaneseText: 西門前
Entry.EnglishText: West Gate

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城前
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: 商店前
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄道に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Don't Ride

Entry.Notes: <ADDED>
<ADDED>

Entry.JapaneseText: あんな事になったのも、 全部、ガジュマのせいに違いない……!!
Entry.EnglishText: The fact that something like that happened, it's all Gajuma's fault for sure...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマがいなければ、 ガジュマがこの地上から 消えてなくなれば……!!
Entry.EnglishText: If only Gajuma didn't exist, if only Gajuma disappeared from this world...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダがあんなになっちまって…… イーガ様に面会を求めにここまで来たが、 応じてもらえなかったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda has become like that... He came here looking forward to meet Eaga, but he didn't accept.

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴル坊ちゃんはなんでか知らんが、 キョグエンに行っちまうし……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know why, but the Igor boy went to Kyogen...

Entry.JapaneseText: トホホ……俺はこれから どうすりゃいいんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Boo-hoo-hoo, what should I do from now on...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様の儀式前だという事で、 バカ騒ぎをする者も現れている。
Entry.EnglishText: Some people are fooling around right before the queen's ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴公らはそのような事が ないようにな。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you're not like them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……手配中の女に似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: ...You look similar to a wanted woman...
Entry.Notes: Could be "she looks like [...]" depending on the context - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: ……手配中の男に似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: ...You look similar to a wanted man...
Entry.Notes: Could be "he looks like [...]" depending on the context - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 連れのヒューマたちが、 ガジュマを刺激しないよう 充分注意してくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma accompanying you, be very careful not to provoke the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ヒューマはヒューマに 話を聞いたらどうだ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...How about Huma just talk to other Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの種族主義者が アガーテ様を処刑しようとした、 という噂が広まっている……
Entry.EnglishText: There are rumours spreading around that say that Huma extremists have tried to execute Agarte-sama...

Entry.JapaneseText: あれはデマらしいが、もし本当に そんな事があれば、俺は志願して ヒューマと戦うだろう……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems to be a false rumour, but if that was true, I would volunteer to fight the Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマよ、よく聞け！ 噂のように、貴様らが陛下に 危害を加えようものなら、 我ら軍が黙ってはいないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma, listen up! If the rumours that you have injured Her Majesty are true, our army won't stay silent.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとの戦いにそなえ、 ガジュマの兵士の増員が必要だ。
Entry.EnglishText: In preparation for the war against Huma, we need more Gajuma soldiers.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうだ、おまえもカレギア軍に 入ってみないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Will you join the Callegean army?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマめが…… 目障りだ、今すぐ立ち去れ！
Entry.EnglishText: Those damned Huma... You're an eyesore, leave immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: このところ、以前のように ヒステリックなケンカは減っている。
Entry.EnglishText: Recently, hysterical fights have decreased, just like it was before.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、ガジュマとヒューマの 関係が良くなったわけではない。 むしろ、悪化しているような気がする……
Entry.EnglishText: However, that doesn't mean that the relationship between Gajuma and Huma have improved. In fact, I feel it's getting worse...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの外出は 極力控えるようにと 通達が出ているはずだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Regarding Huma's trips, word should have been received to restrain themselves as much as possible!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一般市民は、通達があるまで 自宅待機せよと言われているはずだ。 やたらと外を出歩くな。
Entry.EnglishText: The ordinary people should be told to stay at home until further notice. Don't go out profusely.

Entry.JapaneseText: 安心しろ。 有事の避難の際は、ガジュマを 優先するよう言われている。
Entry.EnglishText: Relax. In the case of an emergency evacuation, Gajuma come first.
Entry.Notes: Maybe this translation could be improved somehow.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの外出は 極力控えるようにと 通達が出ているはずだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Regarding Huma's trips, word should have been received to restrain themselves as much as possible!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダと違って、バルカは 地盤が堅強だと聞いている。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that unlike in Razilda, in Balka the ground is solid and resistent.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに、有事の避難の際は、 ガジュマを優先するよう言われている。 心配するな。
Entry.EnglishText: Besides, in the case of an emergent evacuation, it is said that Gajuma should be given priority. Don't worry.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの外出は 極力控えるようにと 通達が出ているはずだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Regarding Huma's trips, word should have been received to restrain themselves as much as possible!

Entry.JapaneseText: 言う事を聞かなければ 逮捕する事も許可されている。 わずらわせるなよ、いいな！
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't listen to what I say, I'm authorized to arrest you. Don't bother me, ok?

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスが大量発生して、 市民が次々と負傷している……！
Entry.EnglishText: There's a large number of Birus outbreaks and the townspeople have been injured one by one...!

Entry.JapaneseText: これ以上の犠牲を出さないためにも、 早急にガジュマの避難を終わらせ なくては……
Entry.EnglishText: To avoid more victims, the evacuation of Gajuma must end immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスの排除で手一杯だ！ ヒューマとのムダ話に 付き合っているヒマはない！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm busy enough with getting rid of the Birus! I can't waste my time chatting with Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、緊急避難場所として、 カレギア城に人々が集まっている。 急いで避難するんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Right now, people are gathering at Callegea Castle, which is acting as an emergency shelter. You have to hurry and take refuge!

Entry.JapaneseText: これ以上、ガジュマとヒューマの 対立が激しくなれば、国の秩序は 崩壊してしまう……
Entry.EnglishText: If the conflict between Gajuma and Huma gets more intense than it is now, the order in this country will collapse...

Entry.JapaneseText: 平和を脅かす者を、決して 許すわけにはいかん……！
Entry.EnglishText: We can't ever forgive those who threaten peace...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここ、霧深き都バルカは 女王様の儀式前なので 特別警戒下にある。
Entry.EnglishText: Since the queen will be here, in the capital city of Balka, before her ceremony, the city is on high alert.
Entry.Notes: I feel it this translation could be improved somehow.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不用意な行動は 慎むように。
Entry.EnglishText: Refrain from taking careless actions.

Entry.JapaneseText: むむ……貴様…… 怪しいな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... You... You are suspicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下のお披露目の儀式は 中止になった。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty's coronation ceremony has been cancelled.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下におかれては、軽く お風邪を召されたとの事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty has caught a mild cold.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下について、よからぬ 噂が流れているが……
Entry.EnglishText: There are some dark rumours circulating regarding Her Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下はカレギア城にて お変わりなくお過ごしに なられている。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty is constantly at the Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: よけいな話を広めないよう、 充分、注意してほしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Be careful not to spread superflous stories.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの間で、アガーテ陛下が ベルサスで処刑されそうになったと 噂が広まっているようだが……
Entry.EnglishText: Rumours about Her Majesty Agarte being almost executed at Belsas are spreading among Huma.
Entry.Notes: Among Huma or at the hands of Huma? Not totally sure.

Entry.JapaneseText: 根も葉もないデタラメだ。 下手に噂を広めて、ガジュマの 感情を逆なでするような言動は慎め！
Entry.EnglishText: That's unfounded nonsense. Refrain from spreading untactful rumours and saying things that irritate Gajuma's feelings!

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様はガジュマとヒューマの 対立を望まれているわけではない。
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva doesn't want a confrontation between Gajuma and Huma.
Entry.Notes: Dunno if adding lady as sama would fit here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとの共存関係を 取り戻すためには、自らの 血を流す覚悟が必要だと、 おっしゃったのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It was said that in order to return to coexistence with Huma, we need to be prepared to shed blood.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らガジュマは、ジルバ様のもと 心をひとつにした……かつての 共存関係を取り戻すために……！
Entry.EnglishText: We, Gajuma, have united our hearts under Lady Zilva's command... To restore our previous situation of coexistence...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様らヒューマが対抗意識を捨て、 争いをやめない限り、我らガジュマは 徹底的に戦うまでだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: As long as you Huma don't give up your antagonistic mentality and stop fighting, we Gajuma will fight you until the very end...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマによるガジュマへの 攻撃が日に日に激しくなっている。 ヒューマには気をつけろ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma's attacks on Gajuma are becoming more violent day by day. Beware of the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが集まって 何を企んでいる!? 逮捕されたくなければ すぐに解散しろ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma are assembling together... What are you up to!? If you don't want to get arrested, Disperse immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの民間人の間で、 この地鳴りに対する不安が 高まっている……
Entry.EnglishText: The concern about this rumble of the earth is rising among Gajuma civilians,

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、我々軍も原因を調査中だ。 詳しい事がわかり次第発表する。 くれぐれもパニックを起こさないように。
Entry.EnglishText: We, the army, are currently investigating the cause. As soon as we know more details, we'll make an announcement. Please be careful and do not panic.

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴りに加えて、ヒューマが 下手にガジュマの市民を刺激すれば 大変な騒ぎになってしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: In addition to the earthquake, if Huma provoke the Gajuma, there will be big troubles.

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様らヒューマはおとなしく 部屋に戻っていろ！
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma, go back to your rooms!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマによるガジュマへの 攻撃が日に日に激しくなっている。 ヒューマには気をつけろ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma's attacks on Gajuma are becoming more violent day by day. Beware of the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが集まって 何を企んでいる!? 逮捕されたくなければ すぐに解散しろ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma are assembling together... What are you up to!? If you don't want to get arrested, disperse immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街から脱出するガジュマの家を 狙ってヒューマの空き巣が増えている！ 用心するんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma burglars who have their eyes on the houses of Gajuma who flee from town are increasing! Be careful.

Entry.JapaneseText: おいヒューマ！ この混乱に乗じて、よからぬ事を 考えるんじゃないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma! Don't even think stupid stuff like taking advantage of this mess!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはいつバイラスが 出るかわからない!! カレギア城に避難するんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know when the Birus will be here!! We have to take refuge in Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間の対立をあおる者は 即刻逮捕する。 不謹慎な言動は慎め。
Entry.EnglishText: Those who instigate confrontation between races will be arrested at once. Refrain from imprudent words and actions.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ……
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa...

Entry.JapaneseText: 行け、<Hilda>…… 私たちの居場所を作るのだろう？
ええ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……死ぬな……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Don't die...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたもね……
ミリッツァ……
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa...

Entry.JapaneseText: 行け…… ここは私が……！
Entry.EnglishText: Go... I'll take care...!
Entry.Notes: I assume she's saying she will handle everything "here" but I'm not 100% sure, so I marked it as problematic - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 行け…… ここは私が……！
Entry.EnglishText: Go... I'll take...!
Entry.Notes: I assume she's saying she will handle everything "here" but I'm not 100% sure, so I marked it as problematic - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 知ってるよ、あの人、 いつも楽しい話を聞かせて くれるから、ボク大好き！
Entry.EnglishText: I know that person. They're always telling me funny stories. I like them!
Entry.Notes: Used "they" because I have no idea who he's referring to right now.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも今日は急いでる みたいだったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: But today they seemed to be in a hurry...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様って、すっごく キレイなんだってね。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty the Queen is very beautiful, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、なかなかお顔を 見る事はできないんだ。 <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>が楽しみだなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: However, I don't see her quite frequently. I'm looking forward to the <Blue>day of Goldba<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、お城に悪い人が入って、 女王様を殺そうとしたんだって。 コワイなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: People say some bad guys entered the castle and tried to kill Her Majesty. How scary...

Entry.JapaneseText: あーあ、結局、女王様 見られなかったな…… 残念……
Entry.EnglishText: Sigh, at the end I couldn't see Her Majesty... What a shame.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様が、ベルサスで みんなにお話したんだって……
Entry.EnglishText: People are saying that Her Majesty talked to everyone in Belsas...

Entry.JapaneseText: いいなあ、ボクも お顔が見たかったなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I also wanted to see her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍隊がダーって、ダーって、 お城から出ってたよ！
Entry.EnglishText: The army is-is-is coming out of the castle!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールに行くって 言ってたよ！
Entry.EnglishText: They said they were going to Minal!

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんは、ガジュマと仲良く しちゃいけないって言うけど、 ボク、そんなのできないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Mom says I musn't be friends with the Gajuma, so I can't...

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、ガジュマの友だちもいるし、 キライになる理由もないし…… 仲良くしたっていいよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Since I have Gajuma friends, I have no reason to hate them... Isn't it good to be good friends?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、もちろんだ。 君のお母さんだって、 きっとわかってくれるさ。
ガジュマとは話しちゃダメなんだ。 お母さんが言ってたもん……
Entry.EnglishText: Mom said I shouldn't talk to the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんは、ガジュマと仲良く しちゃいけないって言うけど、 ボク、そんなのできないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: My mum says I musn't be friends with the Gajuma, so I can't...

Entry.JapaneseText: あのお姉ちゃんだって、 ヒューマなのにガジュマを、 助けてたしさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Despite being a Huma, that girl helped the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえねえ、ミルハウスト様が、 ガジュマと仲良くしろって 言ってたんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: You know? Lord Milhaust told me to get along with the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもさ、お母さんは ダメって言うんだ…… ボク……どうしたらいいの？
Entry.EnglishText: But mom told me to not do that... I... What should I do?

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、こわいよー！ これ、何の音なの!? どうして地面が揺れるの!?
Entry.EnglishText: H-how scary! What is this noise!? Why is the ground shaking!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ラジルダって、 海に沈んじゃったんだよね？ でも、バルカは大丈夫だよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda sank in the sea, right? Balka is ok, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山の上の黒いのって何？ ボク、あんなの見た事ないよ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's that black thing on top of Mount Sovereign? I've never seen something like that!

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山の上の黒いのができてから バイラスがいっぱい出て来たんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Since after the black thing on top of Mount Sovereign appeared, a lot of Birus are coming out!

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんたちは、もうバルカから 逃げるって言って、船の切符を 買いに行ってるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Mom and the others said it's time to flee from Balka, and they went to buy the boat tickets...

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんは、ガジュマと仲良く しちゃいけないって言うんだ…… どうしてなんだろ……
Entry.EnglishText: Mom says I musn't be friends with the Gajuma... I wonder why...

Entry.JapaneseText: 小さなガジュマの男？ そう言えば、さっき ここを逃げて行ったな……
Entry.EnglishText: The little Gajuma boy? Now that you mention it, he ran away from here just now.

Entry.JapaneseText: 霧と機関車の街、そして カレギアの首都でもある バルカへようこそ！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome to Balka, the city of fog and locomotives, and the capital city of Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>には、 女王陛下のお披露目の儀式もあるよ。 見ていって損はないと思うね！
Entry.EnglishText: On <Blue>Goldba Day<White>, Her Majesty will have her debut ceremony. I think it's worth seeing!

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の時間が、少し 遅れてるみたいだね…… 何かあったのかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: It seems the ceremony is running late... I wonder if something happened...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ……か……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、別にだからって…… 何って事もないんだけど……
Entry.Notes: I know what it means but I can't translate it properly - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 結局、お披露目はなかったね。 女王陛下はご病気なのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: At the end, there was no debut ceremony. Could it be that Her Majesty is ill?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、ガジュマ！ ヒューマはおまえたちの 敵なんだろうが！
Entry.EnglishText: What the heck, Gajuma! Aren't Huma your enemies!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 敵に声かけるんじゃねーよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to your enemies!

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスでの事件…… 大きな声じゃ言えないけど ガジュマに反発する気持ちは わかる気がするよ……
Entry.EnglishText: The incident at Belsas... I can't say it out loud, but I get the feel against the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうして国王は代々 ガジュマなんだろうな…… ヒューマは差別されてるのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why has the king been Gajuma for generations... Are the Huma being discriminated...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の後ろ盾があるからって、 ガジュマが下手な事をすれば、 俺たちヒューマも黙っちゃいないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Even if you have support from Lady Zilva, if you Gajuma do something foolish, we Huma won't keep quiet about it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバの演説…… あの女のせいでガジュマたちが 妙に偉そうになって……！
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva's speech... Thanks to that woman, the Gajuma look strangely arrogant...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 店の商品を奪ったり、 ヒューマにケンカ売ったり、 やりたい放題なんだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: They steal from shops, provoke fights with Huma, they do whatever they want...!
Entry.Notes: I feel the punctuation here could be different to make it sound better in English - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: それなのに、軍の奴らは 見て見ぬふりをするんだ！ 許せない……！
Entry.EnglishText: Even so, the army guys turn a blind eye to it! It's unforgivable...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 鼻持ちならないガジュマめが…… 今度はどこで騒ぎを起こそうって 言うんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Those damned stinky Gajuma... Where are they going to cause trouble next time?

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ミナールには 行かない方がいいぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you shouldn't go to Minal!

Entry.JapaneseText: 小さな小競り合いが たくさんあるらしくてな。
Entry.EnglishText: There seems to be a lot of little skirmishes.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ大事には至ってないが、 そのうち、大変な事になるね。
Entry.EnglishText: The situation isn't serious yet, but sooner or later it will be.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……俺には、あんたたち ガジュマの考えてる事が さっぱりわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...As far as I'm concerned, I don't have the slightlest clue about what you Gajuma are thinking...

Entry.JapaneseText: 話す事なんてないから どこかへ消えてくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing to talk about, disappear from my sight!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを助けるなんて やめたほうがいいんじゃないか？ ほっときなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't it better to stop helping the Gajuma? Ignore them...
Entry.Notes: Not sure about the final part - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: ……この前、不思議な光が 降った日があって……その後、急に ガジュマの様子が変わったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Recently, there was a strange light falling down... Afterwards, the appearance of the Gajuma changed suddenly...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちへの嫌がらせの事を 謝りに来るヤツまでいたよ…… 全くガジュマは自分勝手だよな……！
Entry.EnglishText: Some of them even came to apologize for the abuse towards us... Gajuma are so self centered...!

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、こんな時に、 ガジュマが何の用だ!! あっちへ行けよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-what do Gajuma want at a time like this! Go away!

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴り……なんだか、 とてもイヤな感じだな……
Entry.EnglishText: This rumbling... For some reason, it makes me feel bad...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダから逃げて来たガジュマが ヒューマに悪さばかりしてるんだ。 何とかしてくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma who came fleeing from Razilda are doing bad stuff to Huma. Do something!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダと一緒に、ガジュマたちも 海に沈んじまえば良かったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma should have sunk into the sea along with Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマだけになれば、 争いなんて起こらないのに……
Entry.EnglishText: If only Huma existed, there would be no wars...

Entry.JapaneseText: おいあんた、力持ちだけが とりえのガジュマなら、 バイラスを退治しろよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey you, if you're powerful, worthy Gajuma, go kill some Birus!
Entry.Notes: Not totally sure about the translation of the first part - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山のあの黒い影……！ バイラスはうようよ出やがるし、 今度はバルカが沈むのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: That black shadow on Mount Sovereign...! Birus is crawling with Birus, and now Balka is going to sink...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマなんて放っておきなよ。 どうせお礼の一言さえ、聞けや しないぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Leave the Gajuma alone. After all, they won't even say a single word of gratitude!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ……か……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、別にだからって…… 何って事もないんだけど……
Entry.Notes: I know what it means but I can't translate it properly - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてガジュマってのは あんなにヒューマを 毛嫌いするんだろうな……？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do Gajuma have so much prejudice against Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: はて、誰か通ったかな？ 通ったような…… 通らなかったような……
Entry.EnglishText: Did someone pass by the limit? It seems like they did... Or not...
Entry.Notes: Not sure about はて here - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城へは、そこの道を まっすぐに行って、酒場の 先にあるグリーンのアーチを くぐるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: To go to Callegea Castle, you have to take the road over there and go straight, then go through the green arch at the end of the tavern.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうすると、お城の前の 広場に出るよ。 機関車でも行けるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you do that, you'll end up in the square that is in the front of the castle. You can also go by locomotive.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人も増えて、だんだん 盛り上がって来たが、 儀式は始まらんなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: There's more and more people, and they're getting more and more excited, but the ceremony isn't beginning...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何の用だ!? こっちには用はないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: What do you Gajuma want!? We don't need you here.
Entry.Notes: Depending on the context, the "you" may be deleted. - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目がなかったという事は、 陛下の身に何か……？
Entry.EnglishText: Since there was no debut ceremony, did something happen to Her Majesty...?

Entry.JapaneseText: もしそうなら、新しい国王を ヒューマの中から選ぶなんてのは どうだろうな？
Entry.EnglishText: If that's the case, will we have to choose a new monarch among the Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 王様がガジュマだからって 偉そうな顔するんじゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If the monarch is a Gajuma, they're not important-looking.

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスのウワサは聞いたよ。 スカラベという男の気持ちは、 ある意味、ヒューマ全体の 意見かもしれんな……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard the rumours from Belsas. The feelings of the man called Scarabe might represent the opinion of all the Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバの演説が何だ！ 女王陛下は何をやってるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's with Zilva's speech!? What's Her Majesty doing!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 国はヒューマもガジュマも 区別なく扱うんじゃなかったのか！
Entry.EnglishText: Wasn't the country supposed to treat both Huma and Gajuma without distinction!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバの演説が何だ！ 俺たちには、ミルハウスト将軍が いるんだからな！
Entry.EnglishText: What's with Zilva's speech!? We have General Milhaust!

Entry.JapaneseText: 将軍が国王になったほうが この国のためになるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe a general becoming the king would be the best for this country.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのために、 あんたが必死になる事は ないんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have to get so desperate for Gajuma, didn't I tell you?
Entry.Notes: Not sure about the final part - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: この国は、ガジュマのもの じゃないぞ……!! それを忘れるなよな！
Entry.EnglishText: This country doesn't belong to Gajuma... Don't forget!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもが、大きな顔をして ヒューマは家の中にいろ、などと 偉そうにいいおるが……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma act like they own the place. They have the audacity to tell Huma to stay at home with a bossy tone.
Entry.Notes: No idea about the final part - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: この国は、ガジュマのもの じゃないと思い知らせるためにも 俺は外に出ているんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going out to let them know that this country doesn't belong to the Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 図体ばかり大きうて……まったく、ガジュマは邪魔だ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Their bodies are so big... Sheesh, Gajuma are a nuisance!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどものせいで、 なにやら、ゴタゴタとしているな……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the Gajuma, for some reason, we have trouble...

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールから来たという旅人が ガジュマに殴られて、 大変な目におうたと言っておったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: A traveller who said that he had come from Minal was attacked by Gajuma,
Entry.Notes: Not confident about the meaning of the final part - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく…… ガジュマめが……
Entry.EnglishText: Good grief... Those damn Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何を企もうと 俺たちにはミルハウスト将軍が ついてるって事を忘れるなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Regardless of what Gajuma are up to, don't forget we have General Milhaust by our side.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前……ヒューマなのに ガジュマを助けた娘さんが いたよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Recently... There was a girl who helped the Gajuma despite the fact that she was a Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺には…… できないな……
Entry.EnglishText: As of me... I can't do it...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんなんだ、この地響きは。 まるで<Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>の ような不気味な感じだ……
Entry.EnglishText: What's with this tremor? It gives off the same eerie feeling as <Blue>the Dusk of Ladras<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの生き残りのガジュマが ヒューマに悪さするんだが…… かわいそうに思えるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: The surviving Gajuma from Razilda are doing bad things to Huma... I feel sorry for them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマに同情…… なんて……ばかな……
Entry.EnglishText: Compassion for the Gajuma... What...nonsense...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう、この世界はおしまいだ！ どうしたらいいんだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: This world is done for! What should we do...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城へは、そこの道を まっすぐに行って、酒場の 先にあるグリーンのアーチを くぐるんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: To go to Callegea Castle, you have to take the road over there and go straight, then go through the green arch at the end of the tavern.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうすると、お城の前の 広場に出るよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you do that, you'll end up in the square that is in the front of the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと仲良くしちゃ いけないって、お母さんが……
Entry.EnglishText: My mom said that I shouldn't be friendly to Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あなたが同じ立場だったら…… お母さんを助けたいと思わない？
Entry.EnglishText: If you were in the same situation, would you not want to help your mother?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ぼく……
Entry.EnglishText: But, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、あのガジュマは あんたの助けを断ったじゃないか。 どうして肩入れするんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, I thought that Gajuma refused your assistance. Why are you still trying to help her?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは、目の前で人が 死んだとしても平気なのですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: If someone were to die before your very eyes, would you be unperturbed by such a thing?

Entry.JapaneseText: せめて……せめて、 どこで薬が手に入るかだけでも、 教えてください!!
Entry.EnglishText: At least... At least tell me where I can acquire some medicine.

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、街はずれの商店に あるかもしんねえけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-There might be some in the shop near the outskirts of the city...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 礼なんて言われる筋合いはねえよ。 ふん……変な女だ……
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have to go and thank me. Hmph... You're a strange woman.

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉ちゃん……ごめんね。 お母さんがガジュマに 優しくしちゃダメって言うんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, Miss. Mom told me I shouldn't be nice to Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl
Entry.Notes: <ADDED>

Entry.JapaneseText: 母親
Entry.EnglishText: Mother
Entry.Notes: <ADDED>

Entry.JapaneseText: あの…… 薬をもらってきました。 どうか……どうかこれを……
Entry.EnglishText: Excuse me... I've brought you some medicine. Please... Please take it...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなもの……！
Entry.EnglishText: ...How dare you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をするのです!?
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が薬よ……！ ただの……コショウじゃないの……！ バカに……しないで……
Entry.EnglishText: This is no medicine! You've gone... and given me pepper! Don't go making...a fool out of me...

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さん、しっかりして!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hang in there, mom!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……まさか…… コショウだなんて……あの人……
Entry.EnglishText: No... Don't tell me... Did she really give me...pepper?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒドイ!! お母さんが……!! お母さんが死んじゃうよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You're terrible! My mom... My mom's going to die!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんて…… ヒューマなんて……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma... Why, you Huma...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う……違うの！
Entry.EnglishText: No... I didn't mean to...!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたらいいの…… 誰か……誰か助けて……！
Entry.EnglishText: What should I do? Someone... Someone, please help this woman!

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉ちゃん……コレ…… 薬……おうちから持ってきたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, miss... Here. It's medicine. I brought it from my house.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくも、自分のお母さんが 病気だったらすごく困るから……
Entry.EnglishText: I know I'd be upset if my own mom were sick, so...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう……ありがとう！
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you... Oh, thank you!

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、行きましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: Now then, let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待ってください。 この子にひと言ぐらい、何か……
Entry.EnglishText: Please wait! Isn't there something you'd like to say to this child?

Entry.JapaneseText: 助けて欲しいなんて、 言った覚えはないわ。 ヒューマなんかにね。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't remember asking anyone for help. Especially not from a Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな！ この子は、もし苦しんでいるのが 自分の母親だったら……
Entry.EnglishText: How could you say that? This boy thought of how he would have felt had his own mother been in pain...

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分が娘さんの立場なら、 つらいだろうって…… 薬を持ってきてくれたのですよ！
Entry.EnglishText: He was able to put himself in your daughter's shoes and empathized with her suffering. That is why he brought you the medicine!

Entry.JapaneseText: その気持ちに、 ヒューマもガジュマもないと 思いませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: Surely those feelings have nothing to do with one's race?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしたちは、 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>でしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: We are all <Yellow>Human<White> beings, are we not?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマとヒューマは 同じなんかじゃないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Huma and Gajuma are not the same.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ありがとう。 お母さんを助けてくれて、 ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you. Thank you for saving my mom.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！
Entry.EnglishText: You're welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>アガーテは 称号『<item:10000094>』を取得しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Agarte has received the title 『<item:10000094>』

Entry.JapaneseText: うぅ……放っておいて…… ヒューマなんかに、 助けられたくない……
Entry.EnglishText: Uhh... Leave me alone... I don't need help from any Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man
Entry.Notes: <ADDED>

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さん、しっかりして…… お母さん……
Entry.EnglishText: Mom, hold on... Mom...
Entry.Notes: "Hold on" doesn't sound completely good in my opinion - Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 私もカレギア城に 住んでみたいなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I would like to live in Callegea Castle too.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大きくて、キレイで、 アガーテ様がうらやましいなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: Queen Agarte is big and beautiful. I envy her.
Entry.Notes: wat -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様よりも、 カレギア軍の将軍様が みたいなぁ！
Entry.EnglishText: Rather than seeing Queen Agarte, I would like to see the general of the army of Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、強くてカッコイイ 戦士だって聞いたもん。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard he's a strong, cool warrior, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕もいつか、カレギア軍に 入るんだぁ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm also going to join the Callegean army someday!

Entry.JapaneseText: 孫を連れてお披露目の儀式を 見に来たんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I brought my grandchild to see the inauguration ceremony...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシは昔、ラドラス様の お披露目の儀式を見たんじゃが、 いまだにあの時の感動を覚えとる。
Entry.EnglishText: It's been a long time since I saw King Ladras's inauguration ceremony, but I still remember the excitement from that time.

Entry.JapaneseText: その感動を、孫にも 教えてやりたくてね。
Entry.EnglishText: I want my grandchild to know that feeling as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: この人に付き合って 機関車に乗るかわりに お洋服を買ってもらう 約束をしたのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I promised to accompany this person, and in exchange for a ride in the locomotive, I would get some new clothes.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式には、 すてきなドレスが 着たいものね。
Entry.EnglishText: I want to wear a lovely dress for the inauguration ceremony, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハハハ…… お披露目の儀式もいいが、 私は機関車好きでね……
Entry.EnglishText: Ha ha ha... The inauguration ceremony is ok, but I'm more of a locomotive person myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう三十回以上も 乗ってしまったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've used it more than thirty times, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様がどんな衣装で 儀式に出席なさるのか、 それが楽しみで……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm looking forward to what outfit Queen Agarte will wear for the ceremony...

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式まで 待ちきれないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I can't wait until the inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: いやあ、いつ来ても バルカはいいねえ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, whenever I come to Balka it is always good.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式が 楽しみだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm looking forward to the inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く……薬を 届けてあげないと……
薬……誰か薬がどこにあるか、 知ってる人はいないかしら……
<speed:0>『栄光のバルコニー』 お披露目の儀式のパレードで、 国王が広場を通過する際、 上から見おろす事ができるという、 プライドが高い人向きのバルコニー。 見晴らしは決してよくない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>-The Balcony of Glory- A balcony for the proud to look down from above at the monarch when passing through the square during the parade of the inauguration ceremony. The view is never good.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ミマーナ女王像』 第五代カレギア国王ミマーナの石像。 カレギア王国初の女王。賢君だったが、 大臣の目を盗んでは、街中にやって来た というおてんばな一面を持つ人物で、 とても人気があった。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>-Statute of Queen Mimana- Stone statue of Mimana, fifth monarch of Callegea and first queen of the kingdom. She was clever and very popular, but she also had a tomboyish side who came to town to steal the sight of her minister.
